settings.hero_description: An at-home electric blackhead remover and pore cleaner that helps cleanse pores and remove impurities, leaving your skin looking fresher and smoother. This rechargeable, cordless device is compact (170 × 37 × 14 mm) and perfect for home or travel use.

settings.benefit_1: Helps with deep pore cleansing and blackhead removal support
settings.benefit_2: Five interchangeable suction heads for different facial areas and needs
settings.benefit_3: Rechargeable, cordless convenience for easy at-home use
settings.benefit_5: Skin looks smoother and more refined with regular, gentle use

settings.step_description: Fully charge your blackhead remover using the included charging cable. The rechargeable battery provides cordless convenience for at-home or travel use.
Select from the five different suction heads based on your skin area and needs. Each head is designed for different facial zones or suction levels.
Gently move the device over your skin to help remove impurities and excess oil. Follow the user manual instructions for safe and effective use. Clean the suction heads after each use.

settings.heading: How to use your blackhead remover

settings.feature_description: Enjoy the convenience of at-home facial cleansing without visiting a spa. This electric blackhead remover helps you maintain cleaner-looking pores in the comfort of your own home.

settings.feature_title: Personalized experience with five suction heads
settings.feature_description: Switch between five different suction heads to customize your skincare routine. Each head is designed for specific facial areas or suction levels, giving you flexibility for different skin needs.
The built-in rechargeable battery means no cords or wires to deal with during use. Enjoy cordless freedom and flexibility as you cleanse your pores anywhere in your home.
Measuring just 170 × 37 × 14 mm, this device is incredibly compact and easy to store. Toss it in your travel bag or keep it in your bathroom drawer—perfect for home or on-the-go skincare.

settings.feature_title: A practical upgrade over manual methods
settings.feature_description: Move beyond manual squeezing or single-use pore strips. This electric device offers a more controlled approach to help remove blackheads and impurities, making your skincare routine easier and more effective.

settings.heading: Why choose this blackhead remover
settings.subheading: Discover why this at-home pore cleansing device is becoming a skincare essential.

settings.persona_title: People with visible blackheads or clogged pores
settings.persona_description: You want clearer-looking skin and are looking for a practical at-home solution to help cleanse pores and remove excess oil and impurities that can build up over time.
You prefer the convenience and privacy of at-home skincare treatments rather than frequent spa visits. This device helps you maintain your routine on your own schedule.
You travel often and want to maintain your skincare routine on the go. This compact, cordless device fits easily in your luggage without taking up valuable space.

settings.persona_title: Those looking to upgrade their pore care
settings.persona_description: You've tried pore strips or manual extraction but want something more controlled and reusable. This electric remover offers a step up from one-time-use products.

settings.heading: Is this blackhead remover right for you?
settings.description: This electric blackhead remover is ideal for anyone looking to improve their at-home skincare routine with deeper pore cleansing.

settings.question: How do I use this safely and gently?
settings.answer: Always follow the user manual for safe operation. Use gentle, gliding motions and avoid leaving the device in one spot for too long. Start with the lowest suction setting to see how your skin responds, and never use on broken, irritated, or inflamed skin.

settings.question: How do I clean the suction heads?
settings.answer: After each use, detach the suction head and rinse it gently with water to remove impurities and oils. Allow it to air dry completely before reattaching. Regular cleaning after each use helps maintain hygiene and device performance.

settings.question: How often should I use this device?
settings.answer: We recommend starting slowly—perhaps once or twice per week—to see how your skin responds. You can adjust frequency based on your skin's comfort level. Avoid overuse, as excessive suction can irritate the skin. Always allow your skin time to recover between uses.

settings.question: Is this suitable for all skin types?
settings.answer: This device is designed for facial cleansing, but individual skin reactions can vary. We recommend doing a patch test on a small area first and starting with the gentlest suction setting. If you have very sensitive skin, acne, rosacea, or other skin conditions, consult with a skincare professional before use.

settings.question: What about charging and battery life?
settings.answer: The device features a rechargeable battery that can be charged using the included cable. Charging time and usage duration will vary based on the specific battery capacity and your usage patterns. Charge fully before first use and recharge as needed. The device is cordless during use for maximum convenience.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Standard shipping usually takes 5-7 business days, though delivery times may vary by location. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships so you can monitor its progress.

settings.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you may return it in its original condition within 30 days according to our return policy. Please contact our customer service team to initiate a return and obtain return instructions.

settings.heading: Your questions answered
settings.subheading: Everything you need to know about your blackhead remover. Still have questions? Our support team is here to help.
